nodes.bodyText: Why not simply NOT create account?

I just implemented it the same way as it's done for create and create2 opcodes - https://github.com/rsksmart/rskj/blob/master/rskj-core/src/main/java/org/ethereum/vm/program/Program.java#L545
Repository.createAccount fully recreates an account from scratch. Do you thing we should simplify this logic and do nothing for existing accounts?
isnt it better to pass a flag to createAccount? something like "keepBalance"?
